name: The Celestial Cat
description:
The Celestial Cat is a Escape game made with RPG Maker MV.

Story:

The protagonist, Isaiyah Els, Lawyer, wakes up inside a dark cabin. He doesn't know why he's there and can't remember what happened on the last day. Isaiyah will have to find out what happened to him and will have to find a way out of his temporary prison.

During the gameplay a little blue cat will help you to resolve the puzzle and will guide you through your adventure. (Sometimes it won't be that useful but I hope you find it fun.)

- About 15-60 minutes of gameplay -

I hope you enjoy and have fun.
